casebody.data:
Dwayne WIGFALL, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
CITY OF DETROIT, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156793
COA: 333448 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 10, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to extend the time for filing the defendant-appellee's supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 31, 2018.
